oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Baker, Max, 1901 January 21
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Max Baker, “of Nashville, Tennessee, dated December 13th, 1900. Illustrates the first page of the document. Baker’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on January 21st, 1901. The notation on the verso: “Jany. 21/1901” and “prob 1-21-1901, WB 35:504, MB 6:33.” Cites her father, Israel Baker (or Israel Bachrach) “as he is called in his native country, Borisow, Russia, government of Minsk” and her cousin “Mary Cohen.” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Baker family; Bachrach family; Cohen, Mary
